DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two novel active rewarming technique mildly hypothermic people . Volunteers undergo 3 cool trial circulate bath 14 degree celsius rewarmed either shiver alone , warm iv fluid ( IVF ) , water perfusion pad apply hands foot . The investigator hypothesize heat IVF water perfusion pad arteriovenous anastomosis ( AVAs ) prove provide significantly superior rewarming rate shiver alone .
DOC.brief_title: Study Heat Intravenous Fluids Exogenous Rewarming
DOC.criteria: Any healthy male female 18 year age No heart/blood pressure/cholesterol medication . No history Raynaud 's disease condition ( include asthma ) could aggravate coldwater immersion
